resources.string:
Hi, My name is Zin Linn Aung.


I am 25 years old. I was born in April,1995. Currently, I live in Einme township.


I like to playing Mobile Legends. My hobby is coding, drawing, eating, sleeping and watching comedy movies. Guardian of the galaxy is one of my favorite movie.I like Thor too.I am a Marvel Fan.


I love pets, especially giant Alaskan dogs.


I like to eat vegetables and meats.I don't like fish curry but I like grilled fish and beer.
